data.text:
Changelog

This list contains only major user-visible changes.

2024-04-16

New configuration option in the settings: you can now disable automatic machine translation of sentences when searching in the dictionary

Increased the custom sentence length limit for the English translations

When setting a custom example sentence for a card the sentences you've typed in the text boxes won't be cleared in case of an error

Public API update: fixed the 'context' parameter in the machine translation endpoints

2024-04-15

The site is now hosted on new, more powerful server

Sentences typed in the search bar will now be machine-translated into English or Japanese

When setting a custom sentence you can now machine-translate the Japanese sentence into English

Public API update: added new endpoints to machine-translate Japanese into English and English into Japanese

Public API update: added new endpoint for adding new reviews

The furigana in the "do not confuse with" section is now displayed inline, and the section's opacity was increased to improve readability

The "do not confuse with" section will now be always displayed if the target word is not blacklisted and was reviewed at least once

The coverage % numbers on the deck list now also show the two most significant sub-percent digits

Increased the custom sentence length limit

The maximum shown top vocabulary rank was increased from 30k to 50k

You can now change your timezone in the settings

Tripled the amount of bilingual example sentences

Minor fixes to pitch accents

2024-02-27

Fixed an audio issue in Chrome 122

You can now upload custom card images through the website (Patron-only)

Parsing of romaji when searching now tries to match how the words would usually be transliterated, instead of matching what you'd type into an IME (e.g. "michiannai" will now search for "ã¿ã¡ãããªã" insted of "ã¿ã¡ãããã")

New configuration option in the settings: "Enlarge the example sentence and do not show the reviewed word by itself on a separate line (when possible)"

When a Patron's pledge expires the accounts won't incorrectly appear unlinked on the settings page, even if they are actually still linked

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: updated to version 0.8.0

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: you can now adjust the bottom margin of the subtitles

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: the "previous line" and "next line" buttons were moved to the bottom of the screen

2023-06-26

Public API update: the token fields deprecated in the last update are now permanently removed from the API

It is now possible to create custom blacklist decks; see the "Deck state override" page accessible from the "Browse deck" page (Patron-only)

It is now possible to create custom suspend decks; these are similar to blacklist decks, except the cards contained within will still be taken into account when calculating coverage stats (Patron-only)

It is now possible to suspend new reviews from a particular deck (Patron-only)

The "Mark as known" option was removed from the deck dropdown menu; this functionality can now be accessed from the "Deck state override" page

When reviewing new cards the "Part of the â¯â¯â¯ deck" section on the review page will now skip over decks from which new reviews are suspended

New configuration option in the settings: you can now automatically play the example sentence audio on the front of the vocabulary cards

Improved the morphological analyzer

2023-05-26

Fixed a bug accidentally introduced in the last update where certain texts in the corpus or through the API were incorrectly parsed

2023-05-25

Furigana is now taken into account when parsing web novels in the database

All existing web novels were updated with new content and new revisions where applicable

Web novels which are not available anymore are now hidden

Web novels now have subdecks

Public API update: the parsing endpoint will now not return an extra empty array when no tokens were matched in multiarray mode

Public API update: BREAKING CHANGE: the position_utf8, position_utf16, position_utf32, length_utf8, length_utf16, length_utf32 token fields are now deprecated (these still work but will be removed in the next update)

Public API update: new token fields: position, length

Public API update: the parsing endpoint now accepts position_length_encoding which specifies the encoding used to calculate position and length fields

Public API update: new vocabulary fields: alt_sids, alt_spellings, part_of_speech, meanings_part_of_speech, meanings_chunks

Public API update: the parsing endpoint now accepts furigana

Public API update: added CORS to the set-card-sentence endpoint

Public API update: accessing an API endpoint which does not exist will now return a JSON payload instead of an HTML 404 not found page

Public API update: accessing an API endpoint during server maintenance will now return a JSON payload

Improved global word frequency calculations (works which are not part of a category that has its own frequency list will now not affect the global ranking in a disproportionate way)

Fixed an issue where on new versions of Firefox autofocus didn't work

Improved the morphological analyzer

2023-03-30

Added new category to the media database: Books (non-fiction)

Added new category to the media database: Aozora Bunko

Added 110 new entries to the non-fiction database

Added 577 new entries to the Aozora Bunko database

Furigana is now taken into account when parsing books in the database

Worked around a bug in Patreon API where sometimes linking your account with Patreon would result in an internal server error

Public API update: the parsing endpoint in array mode will now properly return empty arrays for strings which contain no tokens instead of omitting them entirely

Public API update: the parsing endpoint will now not forcibly convert kana-only chunks of text into hiragana anymore when generating furigana

Public API update: the parsing endpoint will now reject requests which specify position or length token fields for multiple UTF encodings (e.g. a request for both position_utf8 and length_utf32 will now be rejected)

Added an "Edit image" page accessible from the vocabulary dropdown menu (currently this can only be used to delete images mined with the mpv plugin; the ability to upload custom images will be added in a future update)

Removed the "Lines" stat from visual novel entries; for a lot of entries these numbers were completely wrong as calculating them accurately for certain visual novel engines is not practically possible

Improved furigana for words in the dictionary

Improved Anki database import functionality: decks from the newest version of Anki should now be importable

Improved the morphological analyzer

2023-02-20

Labs experiment update: the new experimental SRS scheduler was updated

Public API update: position_utf32 token field now works properly

Public API update: added position_utf16 and length_utf16 token fields

Public API update: fixed the URL of the endpoint for setting card sentences

Public API update: the parsing endpoint now also accepts an array of strings as input

Public API update: doubled the maximum length limit of the parsing endpoint

2023-02-16

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: updated to version 0.7.0

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: the mined audio is now of slightly higher quality

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: you can now change the default color of the subtitles (this includes the color of things like punctuation which are not parsed as vocabulary)

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: fixed an issue where the popup dictionary sometimes wouldn't trigger when autopause is enabled

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: half width katakana in subtitles is now automatically converted into full width katakana

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: subtitles which use combining dakuten characters are now supported

Labs experiment update: fixed issues with the known words graph

New labs experiment: added a new improved (but for now experimental) SRS scheduling model

New labs experiment: you can now set a custom cooldown period for your failed cards

Added a public API (currently in closed beta)

When a vocabulary card for a name is being reviewed it will say "Name" on the front instead of "Vocabulary"

Increased the number of devices from which you can be simultaneously logged in from 3 to 4

The "hide the example sentence until you tap on it or hover over it" option for the card front won't affect the back anymore

Fixed numerous issues with the "suspend new words which are not in the top N most common words" option

Undoing a review will now also properly update the stats to reflect the undo

Improved the morphological analyzer

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: updated to version 0.6.0

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: updated the protocol between the plugin and the server; old versions of the plugin will no longer work

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: you can now adjust the background opacity of the popup dictionary

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: you can now customize the colors of the subtitles

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: added a button to skip to the next subtitle

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: a message will now be displayed at the top of the screen while a word is being mined

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: the top rank of words is now shown in the popup dictionary

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: fixed an issue where in certain rare cases the plugin would hang mpv

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: fixed an issue where certain subtitles couldn't be parsed

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: improved mined image encoding; the images are now higher quality and consume less space

New configuration option in the settings: you can now automatically play the example sentence audio on the back of the vocabulary cards

You can now search for words in decks

Improved Anki database import functionality: the JP1Kv3 deck can now be successfully imported

Improved the morphological analyzer

New labs experiment: you can now set custom review intervals for the initial learning period

2022-11-27

The frequency of words in the news is now also used when calculating the global word frequency

Reduced bias in the global word frequency list; words which are more useful in general are now ranked higher

Reduced bias in the media-specific word frequency lists; words which are more useful in general within that media are now ranked higher

Ranks for the web novel frequency list are now also shown

You can now create custom top vocabulary decks based on the web novels frequency list (Patron-only)

You can now create custom top vocabulary decks based on multiple frequency lists (Patron-only)

New setting: you can now configure whether the images mined with the mpv plugin will appear on your cards' front and back when reviewing

New setting: you can now blur the example sentence on the front of your cards until you tap on it or hover over it

Based on user feedback the time after which failed cards will be moved to the back of the queue was reduced to 1 hour

New labs experiment: added new setting: "Cycle through all failed cards before showing the same failed card again"

Labs experiment update: abandoned cards are now treated as completely new cards

Reviews when autoreveal is enabled now use the same SRS model as normal reviews, instead of always using the SRS model for pass/fail 2-grade review scale

Improved the morphological analyzer

2022-11-14

New labs experiment: you can now abandon all of you due and failed cards and treat them as new until you review them again

Labs experiment update: you can now force failed cards to be always reviewed first

Failed cards by default will now be moved to the back of the queue after 20 hours instead of half an hour

The scheduler will now automatically refresh its probability estimates for ordering due cards without the user having to trigger it manually (e.g. by logging out, or by changing the settings)

Performance improvements; browsing monolingual sentences and deck creation from text should now be faster

You can now reveal the blurred example sentence during reviews by pressing "C" on your keyboard

Removed autogenerated pitch accent graphs on expressions

Improved the morphological analyzer

Removed the link to our Twitter account from the "Contact us" page since it was permanently suspended by Twitter's automated systems and we have no way of recovering it

2022-10-12

Failed cards which were not recently reviewed are now always delayed until all of the due cards are done

Fixed an issue where in very rare cases a third-party tracking cookie injected by a malicious browser extension made it impossible to log in

2022-10-11

Due reviews are now scheduled according to the probability of recall, with the cards with the highest probability of recall being shown first (previously they were scheduled according to how much time has passed since they became due)

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: external subtitles encoded as UTF-16 are now supported

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: improved handling of very long subtitle lines

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: the font scale for the popup dictionary can now be adjusted in the settings

New labs experiment: the option to delay failed cards until all of the due cards are reviewed

New labs experiment: the option to prioritize due cards with the lowest probability of recall

New labs experiment: coverage stats (see for how many entries in the database you have a given word coverage)

Improved Anki database import functionality: improved compatibility with mpvacious-based card templates

Improved the morphological analyzer

2022-09-26

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: updated to version 0.3.0

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: the region for auto-pause when hovering with a mouse was extended to always be at least as big as a single line of subtitles, regardless whether any subtitles are currently displayed or not

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: added a button to go back to the previous subtitle

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: improved automatic subtitle alignment

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: improved .ass subtitle handling; the plugin won't hang the video player anymore when the subtitles include elaborate karaoke subtitles

Labs experiment update: mpv plugin: the Linux binary doesn't require libopus to be installed anymore

Labs experiment update: the wall of kanji will now take more horizontal space if your browser window is wide enough

Labs experiment update: the score for the known vocabulary leaderboard isn't incorrectly reset to zero anymore in certain circumstances

Labs experiment graduation: the known vocabulary leaderboard has now graduated from the labs and is available to everyone

New configuration option in the settings: "Cards per review session"

The settings page was reorganized and cleaned up

The "cards by level" graph on the "stats" page will now also show due cards

Kanji cards which don't have a default keyword but have a custom keyword set by the user won't be forced into being reviewed in the 'character -> keyword' direction anymore; 'keyword -> character' kanji cards without any keyword will now be blacklisted by default until such one is set

Passing a card on the first review while having new card autoreveal off will now always mark the card as known

Passing a card with a 'hard' grade on the first review while having new card autoreveal off will now not trigger the initial 10 minute learning interval

The default maximum number of new cards for new users was lowered from 30 to 20

Mined sentence audio can now be played back on Safari

Improved support for searching in the dictionary by romaji: words with ã in them can now be searched for

Improved Anki database import functionality: kana-only words where the vocabulary field uses hiragana and the reading field uses katakana (or the other way around) to write the same word are now properly imported

Improved the morphological analyzer

2022-09-10

Labs experiment update: the mpv plugin was updated to version 0.2.0

Labs experiment update: the mpv plugin now properly handles drag & dropped subtitles

Labs experiment update: improved the mpv plugin's startup latency

Labs experiment update: you can now enable a black box around the subtitles and control its opacity

Labs experiment update: the mpv plugin now supports subtitles in the .ass format

Labs experiment update: the mpv plugin now supports subtitles embedded into the video file (.mkv only)

Labs experiment update: the mpv plugin will now automatically retime external subtitles to match the video's internal subtitles

Labs experiment update: the mpv plugin now supports mining images

Labs experiment update: the mpv plugin now supports mining audio

New labs experiment: known vocabulary leaderboard

You can now see your numeric rank on the leaderboard up to the 200th position (previously it was until 150th)

Setting a custom definition that is too long will now generate a proper error message

When changing a custom sentence on a card the input fields will now by default contain your currently set sentence and the translation instead of being empty

When reviewing cards the "Part of the ... deck" which shows from which deck the card was pulled from will now also show the deck which contains the most occurences of that word

When looking at the "more details" screen of a given word in the dictionary you'll now see the sentence you have attached to the card for that word, provided it's a sentence you've set manually

When looking at the "more details" screen of a given word in the dictionary you'll now see the image associated with the card for that word (if such exists)

The sentence audio is now playable on the front of the cards if you have enabled the "Show play button on the front" option

The review sessions should now not get reset when you edit your cards during reviews (this should prevent the "you've finished all of your due cards" screen from popping up multiple times)

Minor tweaks to how the cards look like when they're reviewed

Fixed an issue where on some versions of Chrome the user would get redirected to an invalid page after setting a custom sentence

2022-09-04

Improved support for searching in the dictionary by romaji

2022-08-29

Labs experiment update: the mpv plugin was updated to version 0.1.2

Labs experiment update: the mpv plugin's settings will now appear over the window with the video when opened

Labs experiment update: the mpv plugin now respects mpv's subtitle visibility setting

Labs experiment update: the mpv plugin's installer and the settings window will now properly behave when running on a high DPI screen

Fixed an issue where having the "Pick a new random example sentence..." option would make the sentences explicitly set by the user not display on the front of the cards or when autoreveal of new cards is enabled

2022-08-28

The deck list on the "Learn" page will now always show the top 4 decks, regardless of whether they have new material to learn or not

The "Passive decks" section on the deck list page was removed; those decks will now always show up on your main deck list regardless of whether they're finished or not

Added a new "Special decks" section to the bottom of the deck list page and on the bottom of the "Learn" page

Added a new special deck: "All vocabulary" which is a virtual deck containing the vocabulary from all of your decks combined

Added a new special deck: "Vocabulary I'll never forget" (if you had such a deck already on your deck list it will be migrated)

Added a new special deck: "Blacklisted vocabulary" (if you had any blacklisted vocabulary it will be migrated here)

Added a new entry to the vocabulary menu: "Mark as 'never forget'" to quickly add words to your "Vocabulary I'll never forget" deck

Setting a custom sentence for words now works for many cases where previously you'd get a "you cannot use this sentence as an example for this vocabulary" error

The "export reviews" functionality in the settings now also exports kanji reviews

The "Pick a new random example sentence on the front of Japanese -> English cards every time you do a review" option will now not affect manually set sentences and will only replace those which were picked automatically (for technical reasons this only applies to sentences set after this update; any sentences you've set in the past up until this point will still be affected by this option)

You can now see the total number of known non-redundant vocabulary

New labs experiment: video player integration plugin for mpv with a Yomichan/Rikaikun-style popup dictionary for subtitles and one-click vocabulary/sentence mining

Improved the morphological analyzer

Added new visual novel: Realize

Added new novel: Ameku Takao no Suiri Karute: Genei no Shujutsushitsu

2022-07-19

Improved the way monolingual example sentences are picked; the sentences should now be, on average, of higher quality than they were before

The monolingual sentences shown when you're searching in the dictionary will now be shown even if they're not i+1 (the i+1 sentences, if they exist, will still be prioritized and will be shown first)

New configuration option in the settings: when enabling the "Suspend words outside of the top N most common words" option you can now choose whether that will affect all of your cards, or will only suspend those which are new

You can now see your numeric rank on the leaderboard up to the 150th position (previously it was until 100th)

Fixed an issue where selecting "I don't know this" from the vocabulary menu wouldn't change the next review interval for that card

The JLPT deck was removed

Improved the morphological analyzer

2022-06-02

You now now move decks to the bottom of the deck list by selecting "Set as lowest priority" from the deck's dropdown menu

2022-06-01

When deleting a new deck you can now move all of the unique non-new words to another deck (this is particularly useful if you want to reduce the number of decks you have while maintaining your old cards)

You can now see the number of unique kanji readings when browsing the media database

Added a shortcut for playing the example sentence audio on the review screen: "E"

Fixed an issue where the play button for the example sentence was not shown if you had furigana disabled

Fixed an issue where pressing "R" would play the example sentence instead of the word itself

Fixed an issue where if a word didn't already have an example sentence you couldn't assign one on the review screen

Due to recent abuse by some of the users the maximum number of cards which you can add into a single deck is now limited to 10k as a non-Patron (built-in decks are unaffected; you can still add those decks regardless of how big they are); for Patrons this limit is now 50k

Due to recent abuse by some of the users the total maximum number of unique words which you can have in all of your decks is now limited to 60k as a non-Patron (which is enough to achieve 99% word coverage over everything we have in the database); for Patrons this limit is now 200k

On the regrading screen the button to accept the regrade is now focused by default
